member.name: M:Emergent.Toolbench.WorldBuilder.Environment.UI.TodEditor.PauseAnimation
member.summary: Generic Function to Pause animation. Should include all related events. Includes changing ToggleButton Appearance and setting m_playAnimation boolean value.
